MailKit and MimeKit: see http://www.mimekit.net

License: MIT
MimeKit is open source under the MIT license and is free for commercial use.

We are using version 2.0.3, and the dlls are extraced from the nuget packages, from the lib/net45 directory.

* https://www.nuget.org/packages/MailKit/
* https://www.nuget.org/packages/MimeKit/
